businessProfile.name: Glory Days Pizza
businessProfile.address: 13107 Shawnee Mission Pkwy, Shawnee, KS 66216, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 13107 Shawnee Mission Pkwy, Shawnee, KS 66216, USA

reviews.text: Great pizza cooked perfectly crispy! Service was excellent and location was clean and comfortable! Lots of parking.

First time trying Glory Days Pizza and it was awesome! The service was, hands down, some of the best in the greater Kansas City area, from start to finish! The food was so good and plentiful. The garlic breadsticks and cheesy sticks are a must. The food came out surprisingly fast and was cooked perfectly. One of the better pizza places in the area, highly recommend!

Went on a Saturday evening. The food was hot and fresh. We had taco pizza. We had a meat pizza. We had the garlic breadsticks. Everything was delicious. They're fountain drinks were fantastic. The crew was polite and professional We traveled 30 minutes to come have pizza here, it was well worth it!

Now I know why it is called Glory Days, because it takes me back to my childhood it all the right ways.  We got a basic cheese pizza and it was amazing! Sorry I didn‚Äôt get a picture of the full pizza, but we were enjoying it so much I forgot to take a picture before it was too late. Delivery was great decent time and as you can see the pizza looks good!

I highly recommend this place. The service was not only fast but also very good. My food was served hot and fresh, which made for an excellent meal. Could have been prepared a little bit faster but that's okay

editorial_summary.overview: Local pizzeria chain serving classic & creative pies, plus sandwiches & wings, in a casual space.

recentReviews.text:
Working Labor Day weekend,they were a great experience to the town of Shawnee
Could give hostess and pizza 10 Stars
From the moment you walk in, you'll find good service and good food! Everything is excellent.

I highly recommend this place. The service was not only fast but also very good. My food was served hot and fresh, which made for an excellent meal. Could have been prepared a little bit faster but that's okay

This past September was my 1st visit to Glory Days Pizza!! The quality & quantity of the food is Awesome! The friendly service & patience of the Staff is unmatched! The cleanliness of the restaurant was Awesome as well! I was extremely impressed with the taste of the pizza, & I'll definitely be back to experience more options on the menu!! üíØ‚ù§Ô∏è
They went too light on the olives. I will order extra next time. The sauce could be a little more flavorful but the cheese was melted perfectly and the crust was great. Overall, very good pizza.
The pizza and cheese sticks were really good. This has become my favorite pizza place in KC. The service was friendly too.

Worst pizza I've had in years. Overcooked until it was almost burnt.
Tough and hard to chew. Dry, flavorless.

detailedReviews.author: Douglas Dyer
detailedReviews.text:
Working Labor Day weekend,they were a great experience to the town of Shawnee
Could give hostess and pizza 10 Stars

detailedReviews.author: Paul Vera
detailedReviews.text: From the moment you walk in, you'll find good service and good food! Everything is excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Vile
detailedReviews.text: I highly recommend this place. The service was not only fast but also very good. My food was served hot and fresh, which made for an excellent meal. Could have been prepared a little bit faster but that's okay

detailedReviews.author: Raeshida Williams
detailedReviews.text: This past September was my 1st visit to Glory Days Pizza!! The quality & quantity of the food is Awesome! The friendly service & patience of the Staff is unmatched! The cleanliness of the restaurant was Awesome as well! I was extremely impressed with the taste of the pizza, & I'll definitely be back to experience more options on the menu!! üíØ‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: julie jones
detailedReviews.text: They went too light on the olives. I will order extra next time. The sauce could be a little more flavorful but the cheese was melted perfectly and the crust was great. Overall, very good pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Jay Boswell
detailedReviews.text: The pizza and cheese sticks were really good. This has become my favorite pizza place in KC. The service was friendly too.

detailedReviews.author: Connie Cox
detailedReviews.text:
Worst pizza I've had in years. Overcooked until it was almost burnt.
Tough and hard to chew. Dry, flavorless.

detailedReviews.author: billy parson
detailedReviews.text: By far, mine and my wife's favorite pizza!!!! Love the atmosphere and the staff is amazing

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Boyer
detailedReviews.text: LOVE the Taco pizza. Best anywhere. The Works pizza is also great. Great food, fast service and a fair price. We love Glory Days!

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Henrickson
detailedReviews.text: First time trying Glory Days Pizza and it was awesome! The service was, hands down, some of the best in the greater Kansas City area, from start to finish! The food was so good and plentiful. The garlic breadsticks and cheesy sticks are a must. The food came out surprisingly fast and was cooked perfectly. One of the better pizza places in the area, highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Binder
detailedReviews.text: We just moved to the neighborhood and were searching for pizza that wasn‚Äôt made by the big three companies. We lucked out! Great pie, fantastic crust, fast service, and really nice people. The Baked Potato and Greek pizzas were awesome! Can‚Äôt wait to get Glory Days again!

detailedReviews.author: F D
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza. Ordered carry out and they kept it in a warmer

detailedReviews.author: Joe Gilman
detailedReviews.text: The best

detailedReviews.author: Eric Smolik
detailedReviews.text: Not from around here, just passing through due to work, but I had the best bbq chicken pizza here in a long, long time. Next time I come through here I will definitely stop and get my another pizza from Glory Days Pizza. Thank you. Was the best!!!!

detailedReviews.author: powercathill
detailedReviews.text: My favorite pizza place in Shawnee

detailedReviews.author: richard ratfink
detailedReviews.text: A testament of good pizza is how good is it the next day when it‚Äôs cold this pizza has been consistently amazing I‚Äôve gotten it several times over the last few weeks and it‚Äôs been amazing every single time consistency and quality. Yay pizza yay you guys!

detailedReviews.author: Shireen Miller McLaughlin
detailedReviews.text: We've had delivery pizza from there so many times and it's always been great. It's always  hot when it makes it out to West Shawnee. Monday night that was NOT the case. The pizza was barely room temperature and it had been sitting so long that the bottom of the pizza box was even sagging. we were bummed.

detailedReviews.author: Jodi Perez
detailedReviews.text: Great service with ordering and delivery!  Delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Justin Hildebrand
detailedReviews.text: Best gluten free pizza in KC.

detailedReviews.author: Kathleen Richmond
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza cooked perfectly crispy! Service was excellent and location was clean and comfortable! Lots of parking.

detailedReviews.author: Mr Mo
detailedReviews.text: This place is definitely a rare crystal. The food was good. My only downside was that the pizzas were overcooked, and the cheese felt more like a chewing gum than actual melted cheese, possibly due to being overcooked. The meat wasn't perfect either, I had my share of gristly chicken pieces. Overall, this restaurant has great potential. If they just learned to cook the pizzas properly to prevent over cooking and burning the pizza and took the necessary steps to minimize the gristly meat, then I would rate them 4 stars.

detailedReviews.author: luke stowe
detailedReviews.text: I ordered online so I wasn‚Äôt a huge fan of the way my pizza was made but I‚Äôm 100% confident that if I tweaked my order correctly that I would have throughly enjoyed their thin crust. Even though I was lazy and didn‚Äôt take the time to order it the way I want I still ate the whole thing.

detailedReviews.author: David Sestak
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza at a reasonable price. The service is great and friendly. I love the ability to dine in with nice soft music‚Äîmakes me remember the days of the old school pizza places as a kid. Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Amie Boyd
detailedReviews.text: Ordered pizza from here several times. Always hot, delicious and fresh!

detailedReviews.author: Nick Robertson
detailedReviews.text: Best carry out in town. Always crispy, cooked properly, and you can actually add peppers and onions without getting a soggy pizza. Staff is nice too. Don‚Äôt change Glory Days! We love you.

detailedReviews.author: Cheryl Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and variety of options will come again

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Sullens
detailedReviews.text: Had a carryout order. My first visit. Pizza was excellent with fresh ingredients. Pizza was ready fast, and the young man who was working the front counter was very helpful and professional. Will definitely be back, even though I live quite a ways away. A+ rating!

detailedReviews.author: Paulette Peasley
detailedReviews.text: Went here and young man didn't get all of my order right. I was very tired upset about it. I was loud at him and ask for his manager. Manager come right out and apologize for what happened and made it right. I just want to say both of these young men held their tone soft demeanor was awesome really kept it together. Very good customer service. Manger handle the situation very well. I went to leave and turn around and apologize for my actions as I should had. Kiddo to these young men mom and dad did a really good job with teaching you young men respect!

detailedReviews.author: William Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza ever!

detailedReviews.author: Quinten Gohl
detailedReviews.text: Hostess here is super friendly! The food is always fire even if you come in late for the lunch and eat the slices that weren't exactly fresh out of the oven. I always enjoy visiting this place for lunch.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Honer
detailedReviews.text: Love the pizza but it's a bit expensive and beware of their website. It's not very intuitive, and difficult to navigate - especially if  1) you want to use a coupon code or 'deal', and 2) want any changes to their pre-determined topping combos. I went all the way through the order process and there was no place to enter the coupon code for 2 LG-2 toppings. So I backed up and ordered a BOGO two LG. When we picked up the pizzas the order was messed up.  BUT - and the reason for the 4 stars - we called back and they offered us our choice of a free pizza, a refund or a gift certificate for future. That's GREAT service IMO. And again, the pizza you get, even if the order is messed up - is top notch!

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Mitchell
detailedReviews.text: Carry out orders are always hot and ready to go!  Their pizza is better than the big chains.

detailedReviews.author: Shawnel Neal
detailedReviews.text: Delish food, had my order in time.  We will be back

detailedReviews.author: Sue Jacoby
detailedReviews.text: Clean.  Restrooms clean.

detailedReviews.author: Sharon
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was excellent! Service good.  Look forward to our next visit.

detailedReviews.author: Raymond Krueger
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic food. Pizzas are so delicious all the way to the crust. Homemade pizzas!

detailedReviews.author: lorene Anderson
detailedReviews.text: The pizza topped my favorite place. The staff were very friendly and I loved the high energy woman behind the counter, like can we be best friends. She was on top of everything and like a ray of sunshine. I will be back to other flavors.

detailedReviews.author: Jordan Mahone
detailedReviews.text: We come here all the time after basketball practices or basketball games and every single time it‚Äôs always a great experience. The gentleman at the counter is a younger guy, brown hair, he‚Äôs always so welcoming. Service is always fast and efficient. We came in maybe 30 minutes before close (i know the worst type of people) and we left maybe 10 minutes after close (again, i know the worst type of people) and him and the rest of the staff was nothing but friendly and welcoming! We never felt rushed. Good job Glory Days, you got a solid team here!

detailedReviews.author: Qiana Peterson
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm so excited that we tried this pizza for dinner. All of the ingredients were fresh and the staff was very polite! We will be back! No photos this time we were hungry lol!

detailedReviews.author: Nick Edin
detailedReviews.text: Remember this place from Lawrence. Stoked they moved here. Best pizza in KC! üî•üî•üî•

detailedReviews.author: Trevor Schriever
detailedReviews.text: Very good pizza. Always welcoming when I go pick up. Would recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Dave Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Great place!! Love the pizza

detailedReviews.author: Adam Kirkland
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza my daughter had the spaghetti and said it was delicious!!

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Perkins
detailedReviews.text: Great place.  Fantastic pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Michele Winter
detailedReviews.text: Ever since Godfathers closed, years ago, I‚Äôve been searching for good pizza. My husband and I keep a list of all the pizza places we‚Äôve tried and if we liked it or not, mostly not. I believe my search is finally over! We tried Glory Days today and it is hands down the best pizza I‚Äôve had in years. The original crust is like how Pizza Hut‚Äôs pan crust used to be, only thinner and less greasy. The sauce is delicious with a generous amount and the ingredients taste like they‚Äôre fresh, not frozen or canned. We ordered carry out so I can‚Äôt comment on the atmosphere but the lady who rang us up told us she applied a coupon on our rather large order, which we really appreciated. She was also super friendly. It‚Äôs quite a drive from our house over to Midland Dr but it‚Äôs definitely worth it. Excellent pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Sabrina Gallagher
detailedReviews.text:
Ordered online for the baked potato pizza and it's delicious. I added extra sour cream to the top and bbq sauce on the crust.
They said 45 mins to get here and it was 35.
Will definitely be ordering again from here

detailedReviews.author: Matt Dodd
detailedReviews.text: Very good pizza, fresh ingredients.

detailedReviews.author: Charles Williams
detailedReviews.text: I bought a whole bunch of pizzas, salads and more for some friends who had never tasted the great food there. They loved it!!! They are so friendly

detailedReviews.author: Amber Kresha
detailedReviews.text:
We almost exclusively order delivery, but sometimes carryout. You can't go wrong with any pizza here--but to be fair the baked potato is pretty close to the top! We also like the taco, Margherita, and the Mediterranean.

We like to order delivery from Glory Days when we have a birthday party at Shawnee Civic Center. Always on time and hot. My son had a NERF war for his birthday, the driver showed up with a NERF gun ready to dive in! Can't say enough good things about them. 5/5 recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Sam H
detailedReviews.text: Stopped in for sandwiches carry out. The place is cool, and the lady running things here is genuine and kind.  And the food was great!  Can‚Äôt wait to come back for pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Maureen Rusley
detailedReviews.text: Online ordering was easy, food was ready when we arrived to pick up, employee up front was VERY friendly and sweet, pizza is excellent!!

detailedReviews.author: Kate Owings
detailedReviews.text: We love the thin crust! The bbq chicken and the Greek are our favorites!

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Mitchell
detailedReviews.text: Picked up order for office party they were super nice

detailedReviews.author: Caden Sunday
detailedReviews.text: Very good pizza. Love how the crust is thick but still crispy. I really enjoyed both the chicken bacon ranch and the Greek pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Tykela Danner
detailedReviews.text: I've been seeing this place for some years now I came here because my family aren't big business pizza people so we thought we give this place a chance because we wanted pizza for dinner and tonight is my 1st and last time ordering from this place. I ordered two large pizzas 1 cheese, 1 pepperoni and beef. I got 3 pepperonis on the pizza and a load of beef. The crust was extra hard, I asked for light on the sauce and literally got like a teaspoon full of sauce on the pizza. The lady at the register had ok customer service, I guess she thought if she talked fast or try to over talk me which is rude that I wouldn't notice her being an a-hole towards me.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel M
detailedReviews.text: The pizza reminds me of what pizza hut was like in the 80s and early 90s when it was still good.  I get the original crust works and it completely hits that old school pan supreme taste for me, love it.

detailedReviews.author: Jesse Rocha
detailedReviews.text: I think it is best pizza in town.

detailedReviews.author: Bruce Cornett
detailedReviews.text: Salad was a big disappointment.  Pizza was good.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Sternshein
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful, hot pizza. Great service and friendly, helpful employees.

detailedReviews.author: Liz Francis
detailedReviews.text: We went here for my son‚Äôs birthday before going trick-or-treating last night. The food was excellent and came out fast but the reason this place was so amazing was the woman that worked there. She was BEYOND helpful. I‚Äôve never had such amazing customer service in my entire 44 years on this planet. I don‚Äôt live in Shawnee but I‚Äôll tell you what, I‚Äôd make a special trip out there to give this place my money.

detailedReviews.author: Tim Sirdoreus
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza crust in town

detailedReviews.author: Carol Henson
detailedReviews.text: The staff here are great (same people every time) and the pizza is served nice and hot. I love the sauce on the pizza and the crust is thick but not too thick. Desserts are yummy, too.

detailedReviews.author: Kade Emily
detailedReviews.text: Yummy yummy

detailedReviews.author: christopher williams
detailedReviews.text: Ordered the cauliflower crust all meat pizza. It was great.

detailedReviews.author: michael lee
detailedReviews.text: Loved the pizza üçï üòã

detailedReviews.author: Lukasha ‚ÄúRingo‚Äù Fetters
detailedReviews.text: fantastic, way better than something like Minsky's or Pizza hut. like, not even close. great crusts and sauce, with little to no wait. i get their baby baked potato pizza for my lunch breaks.

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Ferris
detailedReviews.text: We love Glory Days Pizza! We have eaten there as a family and we have also used them for school events. The food is delicious, and our guests loved it. Great spot!

detailedReviews.author: Joe Dix
detailedReviews.text: Great food and fast service.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the fast and friendly service, highlighting it as some of the best in the greater Kansas City area. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The pizza, especially unique offerings like the Taco, Baked Potato, and Greek pizzas, receives high praise for taste and quality. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant's cleanliness and welcoming atmosphere are frequently mentioned as standout features. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Overcooked and improperly prepared pizzas - review management can address this concern
Poor website navigation and ordering issues - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Negative customer service experiences - social media marketing can improve this area

My only downside was that the pizzas were overcooked, and the cheese felt more like a chewing gum than actual melted cheese, possibly due to being overcooked. The meat wasn't perfect either, I had my share of gristly chicken pieces. Overall, this restaurant has great potential. If they just learned to cook the pizzas properly to prevent over cooking and burning the pizza and took the necessary steps to minimize the gristly meat, then I would rate them 4 stars.

Worst pizza I've had in years. Overcooked until it was almost burnt.
Tough and hard to chew. Dry, flavorless.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
